title: Octopus Hearts
text: An octopus has three hearts — two pump blood to the gills, and one pumps it to the rest of the body.

title: Honey Never Spoils
text: Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are 3,000 years old and still edible.

title: Banana is a Berry
text: Botanically, bananas are berries but strawberries are not.
